Original: Ah, you are taking that request?
The man sitting there with a fishing
rod is a legendary angler.
[Page]
He seems to want you to bring back
something from a monster. You should
ask him in person for the details.
[Page]
Well then, kismet be with you,
and I shall await your swift return.
Translation: Ah, you are taking that request?
The man sitting there with a fishing
rod is a legendary angler.
[Page]
He seems to want you to bring back
something from a monster. You should
ask him in person for the details.
[Page]
Well then, kismet be with you,
and I shall await your swift return.

Original: You realize that you already have a
[Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]. Simply report in and
the request will be complete!
Translation: You realize that you already have a
[Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]. Simply report in and
the request will be complete!

Original: Welcome back. I heard that you caught
quite a... "whopper"? Impressive work
as always, [Guild] Guild.
[Page]
The client told me that he believes
you may draw out that turtle as many
times as you want using that method.
[Page]
It might be fun to go fishing again
sometime... Well done, as always.
Translation: Welcome back. I heard that you caught
quite a... "whopper"? Impressive work
as always, [Guild] Guild.
[Page]
The client told me that he believes
you may draw out that turtle as many
times as you want using that method.
[Page]
It might be fun to go fishing again
sometime... Well done, as always.

Original: As you search for the water hole the
client directed you to, you see a lake
below which fits the description.
[Page]
This is most likely the habitat of
the giant turtle...
[Page]
You remember the client's directions
to try dropping food into the lake.
Translation: As you search for the water hole the
client directed you to, you see a lake
below which fits the description.
[Page]
This is most likely the habitat of
the giant turtle...
[Page]
You remember the client's directions
to try dropping food into the lake.

Original: The food you dropped disappears into
the lake...
Translation: The food you dropped disappears into
the lake...

Original: You wait for a time to see what the
result might be, when bubbles begin
to surface in the water!
Translation: You wait for a time to see what the
result might be, when bubbles begin
to surface in the water!

Original: Though you ready yourselves for
combat, the surface of the water
grows calm and still again...
Translation: Though you ready yourselves for
combat, the surface of the water
grows calm and still again...

Original: They are followed by a huge underwater
shadow...! Lured by the food you
dropped, a monster is drawing near!
[Page]
You ready yourselves to challenge the
approaching beast in combat!
Translation: They are followed by a huge underwater
shadow...! Lured by the food you
dropped, a monster is drawing near!
[Page]
You ready yourselves to challenge the
approaching beast in combat!

Original: You have defeated the giant turtle,
but failed to obtain the requested
material...
[Page]
In order to fulfill the client's
request, you must challenge it again.
Translation: You have defeated the giant turtle,
but failed to obtain the requested
material...
[Page]
In order to fulfill the client's
request, you must challenge it again.

Original: You have defeated the giant turtle
and gained its [Color:6][Item:1051][Color:0]!
[Page]
All that remains is to deliver it to
the client waiting at the bar and
the request will be complete!
Translation: You have defeated the giant turtle
and gained its [Color:6][Item:1051][Color:0]!
[Page]
All that remains is to deliver it to
the client waiting at the bar and
the request will be complete!

Original: The dropped food disappears into the
water, but nothing comes to claim it.
Perhaps not enough time has passed...
Translation: The dropped food disappears into the
water, but nothing comes to claim it.
Perhaps not enough time has passed...

Original: You recall accepting a request to
recover a [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]...
[Page]
You must be careful not to sell it
before you have a chance to deliver
it to [Color:5]Big-Bait[Color:0] at the bar.
Translation: You recall accepting a request to
recover a [Color:6][Number:0][Color:0]...
[Page]
You must be careful not to sell it
before you have a chance to deliver
it to [Color:5]Big-Bait[Color:0] at the bar.
